Checkout the new spacing classes!!!

Added [.section-py-md .section-px-sm .margin-md] to acheive the padding and margins on this component!

  • src/config/variables sets the margin and padding sizes
  • src/config/functions.scss sets up the mixin structure
  • src/elements/mixins sets up @include capablities for scss files
  • src/elements/elements/spacing sets up classes to allow you to add a class to get the margin and padding classes
